answers.text:
Hi Izzy, 
There are a few documents on the Knowledge Network related to intergovernmental agreements that you may find useful. Unfortunately I was not able to find one about energy usage after a natural disaster but between the two posted below I believe you will be able to create an intergovernmental agreement that suits yout local government's needs. 
- Intergovernmental Agreement for Equipment Sharing http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/303804/Intergovernmental_Agreement_for_Equipment_Sharing
-Intergovernmental Agreement for Sharing a Fire Station
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/305139
-Intergovernmental Agreement for a Hazardous Waste Unit icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/303805
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Izzy Murguia
text: Does your city have an intergovernmental agreement with a local entity for the use of its fueling facility in a natural disaster situation? If so, could you please provide me with a copy of your agreement? Thank you in advance for your assistance.
title: Intergovernmental Agreement - Use of Fuel Facility
